arStrings.szText: A vampire army terrorizes Sanctuary. You must claim their power and put an end to their rampage. This content unlocks after {c_highlight}Campaign completion{/c}.

Vampires prowl Sanctuary gathering blood for their shadowy master. You must unmask and defeat this new threat.

{c_highlight}{icon:bullet, 1}All new Questline & Boss:{/c} Stop a blood-fueled ritual before it's too late.

{c_highlight}{icon:bullet, 1}New Vampiric Powers:{/c} Unlock vampiric bonuses and harness them to increase your character's power.

{c_highlight}{icon:bullet, 1}5 Replayable Endgame Bosses:{/c} Battle high-level bosses for loot in World Tiers 3 and 4.

{c_highlight}{icon:bullet, 1}All new Season Journey:{/c} Conquer 7 Chapters of challenges.

{c_highlight}{icon:bullet, 1}7 new Legendary Aspects & 12 new Unique Items:{/c} Explore new ways to build and play each Class.

{c_highlight}{icon:bullet, 1}2 new Paragon Glyphs for each Class:{/c} Check out new ways to grow your character's power.

{c_highlight}{icon:bullet, 1}All new Cosmetics:{/c} Acquire seasonally themed looks in the Battle Pass and other new looks in the Shop.
